entries.heading: Students
entries.text: Have questions about joining MDST? Curious about our projects? Or just want to keep up with our socials? Send us an email, check out our Instagram, and connect with us on LinkedIn!

entries.heading: UM Departments
entries.text: MDST would be delighted to partner with your department to promote your data science efforts to our students. Please contact us if you are interested in hosting a talk or sponsoring our club.

entries.heading: Industry Partners
entries.text: Partner with MDST to find top data science talent and power your company's mission. We offer engagement and sponsorship opportunities to fit your needs. Please email us at mdst-coms@umich.edu to learn more.
